subcourses.title: BASI Snowboard/Ski Level 1
subcourses.desc:
4-day course

Included in the price:
1. First year BASI membership
2. BASI training course
3. Instructor certification and assessment
4. SnowWorld facility fees
5. Full-day lift tickets during assessment
6. Equipment rental (helmet, ski wear, skis/snowboard, boots) during assessment

Not included:
Transportation, accommodation, meals, insurance, etc.

See BASI official site: https://www.basi.org.uk/BASI/Courses/BASI/Courses/Disciplines.aspx?hkey=26544a24-cde1-4939-a16b-76f39a4a4626

subcourses.title: BASI Snowboard/Ski UK Level 2
subcourses.desc:
4-day course

Included in the price:
1. First year BASI membership
2. BASI training course
3. Instructor certification and assessment
4. SnowWorld facility fees
5. Full-day lift tickets during assessment
6. Equipment rental (helmet, ski wear, skis/snowboard, boots) during assessment

Not included:
Transportation, accommodation, meals, insurance, etc.

See BASI official site: https://www.basi.org.uk/BASI/Courses/BASI/Courses/Disciplines.aspx?hkey=26544a24-cde1-4939-a16b-76f39a4a4626

subcourses.title: BASI 单板/双板 Level 1
subcourses.desc:
课程为期4天

课程费用包含：
1.首年BASI会员年费
2.BASI 课程培训费用
3.BASI 指导员认证及考试费用
4.SnowWorld场地使用费
5.考试期间全天雪票
6.考试期间雪具租赁（头盔/雪服/雪板/雪鞋）

费用不包含：
交通，住宿，餐饮，保险等

详情可见BASI官网：https://www.basi.org.uk/BASI/Courses/BASI/Courses/Disciplines.aspx?hkey=26544a24-cde1-4939-a16b-76f39a4a4626

subcourses.title: BASI 单板/双板 UK Level 2
subcourses.desc:
课程为期4天

课程费用包含：
1.首年BASI会员年费
2.BASI 课程培训费用
3.BASI 指导员认证及考试费用
4.SnowWorld场地使用费
5.考试期间全天雪票
6.考试期间雪具租赁（头盔/雪服/雪板/雪鞋）

费用不包含：
交通，住宿，餐饮，保险等

详情可见BASI官网：https://www.basi.org.uk/BASI/Courses/BASI/Courses/Disciplines.aspx?hkey=26544a24-cde1-4939-a16b-76f39a4a4626

subcourses.title: BASI Snowboard/Ski Niveau 1
subcourses.desc:
4-daagse cursus

Inbegrepen in de prijs:
1. Eerste jaar BASI-lidmaatschap
2. BASI trainingscursus
3. Instructeurscertificering en examen
4. SnowWorld faciliteitenkosten
5. Dagelijkse skipas tijdens het examen
6. Materiaalhuur tijdens het examen (helm, skikleding, ski's/snowboard, schoenen)

Niet inbegrepen:
Vervoer, accommodatie, maaltijden, verzekering, etc.

Meer info: https://www.basi.org.uk/BASI/Courses/BASI/Courses/Disciplines.aspx?hkey=26544a24-cde1-4939-a16b-76f39a4a4626

subcourses.title: BASI Snowboard/Ski UK Niveau 2
subcourses.desc:
4-daagse cursus

Inbegrepen in de prijs:
1. Eerste jaar BASI-lidmaatschap
2. BASI trainingscursus
3. Instructeurscertificering en examen
4. SnowWorld faciliteitenkosten
5. Dagelijkse skipas tijdens het examen
6. Materiaalhuur tijdens het examen (helm, skikleding, ski's/snowboard, schoenen)

subcourses.title: Beginner Tricks
subcourses.desc:
Led by BASI Level 4 instructors to help you advance in the terrain park.

Each course is a 2-day group session with 8 participants.

Please inquire for schedule.

subcourses.title: 初级动作
subcourses.desc:
由BASI 4级教练带领小伙伴们进阶公园。

每次课程为团课形式为期2天，8人开团。

开团时间可咨询

subcourses.title: Beginners tricks
subcourses.desc:
Onder leiding van een BASI niveau 4-instructeur voor gevorderde freestyle tricks.

Elke cursus duurt 2 dagen in groepsvorm, minimaal 8 deelnemers.

Neem contact op voor beschikbare data.

subcourses.title: 1-on-1 Coaching
subcourses.desc:
Customized private sessions based on your needs.

Each session is 2 hours.

Taught by certified BASI or CASI instructors.

Up to 4 participants per session.

Please inquire for details.

subcourses.title: 一对一教学
subcourses.desc:
根据个人需求定制课程。

课程为2小时，授课教练均为BASI或CASI体系教练

课程人数至多为4人，详细请咨询

subcourses.title: Individuele coaching
subcourses.desc:
Privélessen op maat op basis van jouw behoeften.

Elke sessie duurt 2 uur.

Gegeven door gecertificeerde BASI of CASI instructeurs.

Maximaal 4 deelnemers per sessie.

Informeer voor details.

subcourses.title: Beginner Group Course
subcourses.desc:
For complete beginners.

6 to 10 participants per session.

Includes 3 hours of instruction.

Price includes:
1. Lesson
2. Full-day lift ticket
3. Full-day equipment rental

Not included: transport, meals, insurance, etc.

subcourses.title: 0基础入门团课
subcourses.desc:
课程人数6人-10人

0基础入门课程

课程包含3小时教学

费用包含：
1. 教学
2. 全天雪票
3. 全天雪具租赁

费用不包含：
交通，餐饮，保险等

subcourses.title: Beginners groepscursus
subcourses.desc:
Geschikt voor volledige beginners.

Groep van 6-10 personen.

Bevat 3 uur les.

Inbegrepen:
1. Les
2. Dag skipas
3. Dag verhuur van uitrusting

Niet inbegrepen: vervoer, maaltijden, verzekering, etc.

subcourses.title: Easter Riding Week
subcourses.desc:
A week-long snow adventure with SnowNavi.

Group of 8 participants.

Luxury apartment with Matterhorn view included.

Price includes:
Accommodation

Not included:
Lift ticket, transport, meals, insurance, etc.

subcourses.title: 复活节畅玩周
subcourses.desc:
一周滑雪狂欢，SnowNavi 陪你嗨。

人数8人

SnowNavi定好豪华雪景公寓可以遥望马特洪峰

费用包含：
公寓住宿

费用不包含：
雪票，交通，餐饮，保险等

subcourses.title: Paas Sneeuwweek
subcourses.desc:
Een week sneeuwplezier met SnowNavi.

Groep van 8 personen.

Luxe appartement met uitzicht op de Matterhorn inbegrepen.

Inbegrepen:
Accommodatie

Niet inbegrepen:
Skipas, vervoer, maaltijden, verzekering, etc.
